definitions.definition: To end, especially in an incomplete state.
definitions.example: to terminate a surface by a line

definitions.definition: To set or be a limit or boundary to.
To end the employment contract of an employee; to fire, lay off.
Of a mode of transport, to end its journey; or of a railway line, to reach its terminus.
Of a decimal: having a finite number of digits.
definitions.example: Every rational number can be written as either a terminating decimal or a recurring decimal.
